#117 400 SILVER BERRY RD NW, Edmonton, AB, T6T 0H1

$225,000

2 Beds

2 Baths

Property Information:

Welcome home to Village on the Park! This immaculate unit features a gorgeous kitchen with classic black appliances, dark mocha cabinetry, with eat up bar. Beautiful Main floor 2 bedroom and 2 bath unit in VILLAGE ON THE PARK. The Living room has large windows that offer lots of sunlight to the home that overlooks the green space in the form of the huge Silver Berry park. The 2 bedrooms are divided by the Living space adding to the privacy. The Master boasts a walk through closet and a full ensuite while the 2nd bedroom is adjacent to the main bathroom that can also be accessed by guests. The building has a Lounge/ Games room on the main level close to the unit, an Exercise room and Guest suite on the second floor.The complex is walking distance to a shopping complex with Banks, Save on Foods, Restaurants etc. The Meadows Recreation Center is also close by.
